config_description: May either be "true" or "false" to enable globally
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration 'hinted_handoff_enabled' is used to determine whether hinted handoff is enabled globally in the system. The code checks if hinted handoff is enabled before proceeding with hinting a replica.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the 'hinted_handoff_enabled' configuration depends on the number of replicas being processed and the frequency of replica operations in the system. It is triggered whenever the shouldHint method is called for a replica.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'hinted_handoff_enabled' configuration option on the system is significant as it determines whether hinted handoff functionality is enabled or disabled globally. Enabling hinted handoff can affect the performance and reliability of the system by ensuring that hints are delivered to replicas in case of node failures.
